Summary:
The CL and EL team meetings are summarized in files using Markdown format. 

[[
## Summary
]]


Status of mainnet merge is still pending due to issues related to 
difficulty bomb delay. The difficulty bomb will be delayed by 4 epochs, 
and the target date for mainnet merge remains uncertain.

Devnet status: CL and EL teams are working on resolving devnet testnets' 
issues with regards to block proposer selection.


The team is also discussing a plan to implement an "exit" mechanism in 
the Beacon Chain. This will allow validators to exit from the network, 
which could be useful for testing purposes or other scenarios.

No specific deadlines were mentioned during this meeting.
